scripts.gen: swagger-typescript-api generate -p openapi.json -o src/api -n api.ts -T axios
scripts.gen-payment: swagger-typescript-api generate -p openapi-payment-service.json -o src/api -n api-payment-service.ts -T axios
scripts.gen-profile: swagger-typescript-api generate -p openapi-profile-service.json -o src/api -n api-profile-service.ts -T axios
scripts.gen-subscription: swagger-typescript-api generate -p openapi-subscription-service.json -o src/api -n api-subscription-service.ts -T axios
